entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 12:30 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
